description:
Smoking has been completely banned in the Shinsengumi headquarters due to Okita`s suggestion. Hijikata, a heavy smoker, desperately resists but is pressured by his peer squad members and reluctantly gives in. He goes outside to smoke but lately most places have also banned smoking…The times have changed and smoking has been banned all throughout Edo by Matsudaira`s suggestion. What will the desperate Hijikata do?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tabako wa Ichihako ni Ichi, Nippon Bafun Mitai na Nioi no Suru Yatsu ga Haitte Iru
Those Who Smoke One or Two Cigarettes Are Putting the Smell of Horse Dung in Them
タバコは一箱に一, 二本馬糞みたいな匂いのする奴が入っている
